org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.server

Interface ServerWebSocket

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Wrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServerWebSocket, AtmosphereServerWebSocket, JwaServerWebSocket, NettyServerWebSocket, PlayServerWebSocket, VertxServerWebSocket

    public interface ServerWebSocket
extends Wrapper
    Represents a server-side WebSocket.

    Implementations are not thread-safe.

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
    See Also:
    RFC6455 - The WebSocket Protocol

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerWebSocket binaryAction(Action<ByteBuffer> action)
      Attaches an action for the binary frame.
      ServerWebSocket close()
      Closes the connection.
      ServerWebSocket closeAction(Action<Void> action)
      Attaches an action for the close event.
      ServerWebSocket errorAction(Action<Throwable> action)
      Attaches an action to handle error from various things.
      ServerWebSocket send(ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
      Sends a binary frame through the connection.
      ServerWebSocket send(String data)
      Sends a text frame through the connection.
      ServerWebSocket textAction(Action<String> action)
      Attaches an action for the text frame.
      String uri()
      The URI used to connect.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.Wrapper

        unwrap

    • Method Detail

      • uri

        String uri()
        The URI used to connect.

      • close

        ServerWebSocket close()
        Closes the connection. This method has no side effect if called more than once.

      • send

        ServerWebSocket send(String data)
        Sends a text frame through the connection.

      • send

        ServerWebSocket send(ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
        Sends a binary frame through the connection.

      • textAction

        ServerWebSocket textAction(Action<String> action)
        Attaches an action for the text frame.

      • binaryAction

        ServerWebSocket binaryAction(Action<ByteBuffer> action)
        Attaches an action for the binary frame.

      • closeAction

        ServerWebSocket closeAction(Action<Void> action)
        Attaches an action for the close event. After this event, all the other event will be disabled.

      • errorAction

        ServerWebSocket errorAction(Action<Throwable> action)
        Attaches an action to handle error from various things. Its exact behavior is platform-specific and error created by the platform is propagated.
